success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

allowedOrigins.description: Lists the origins allowed to display the video. Enter allowed origin domains in an array and use `*` for wildcard subdomains. Empty arrays allow the video to be viewed on any origin.

created.description: The date and time the clip was created.

creator.description: A user-defined identifier for the media creator.

endTimeSeconds.description: Specifies the end time for the video clip in seconds.

maxDurationSeconds.description: The maximum duration in seconds for a video upload. Can be set for a video that is not yet uploaded to limit its duration. Uploads that exceed the specified duration will fail during processing. A value of `-1` means the value is unknown.

meta.description: A user modifiable key-value store used to reference other systems of record for managing videos.

modified.description: The date and time the live input was last modified.

dash.description: DASH Media Presentation Description for the video.

hls.description: The HLS manifest for the video.

preview.description: The video's preview page URI. This field is omitted until encoding is complete.

requireSignedURLs.description: Indicates whether the video can be a accessed using the UID. When set to `true`, a signed token must be generated with a signing key to view the video.

startTimeSeconds.description: Specifies the start time for the video clip in seconds.

status.description: Specifies the processing status of the video.

thumbnailTimestampPct.description: The timestamp for a thumbnail image calculated as a percentage value of the video's duration. To convert from a second-wise timestamp to a percentage, divide the desired timestamp by the total duration of the video.  If this value is not set, the default thumbnail image is taken from 0s of the video.

uid.description: The unique identifier for the watermark profile.
